comment.language: After Psalm 150, the "Hymn for Lazarus Saturday (Lazaroc a~mou e~bol)" may be chanted in the tune of "Blessed be the Father (Je f~c~marouwt)" (standard melodies) or "The Bread of Life (Piwik):
Setelah Mazmur 150, "Hymn untuk Sabtu Lazarus (Lazarus keluarlah)" dapat dinyanyikan dengan nada "Blessed be the Father (Je f~c~marouwt)" (melodi standar) atau "Roti Hidup (Piwik)":

text.language: Lazaroc a~mou e~bol: Pi,~rictoc afmou] e~rok: qen tefvwni n~reftanqo: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol.
“Lazarus come forth,” / Christ called to you / with His life-giving voice / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: "Lazarus keluarlah." Kristus memanggilmu, dengan suara yang memberi hidup, berkata, "Lazarus keluarlah.

text.language: لعازر هلم خارجا المسيح دعاك بصوته المحيي قائلاً: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Lazaroc afmou ouoh au,af qen pim~hau n~f~tou n~e~hoou: a~]c~m/ n~te P[oic voh sarof: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Lazarus died and was buried / in the tomb for four days; / the Lord’s voice reached him / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: "Lazarus mati dan dikubur, dalam makam empat hari, suara Tuhan menjangkau dia, berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!“

text.language: لعازر مات ووضع في القبر أربعة أيام صوت الرب بلغ اليه لعازر هلم خارجاً
Nim/s etauywou] m~mau: eyrounom] n~tefcwni aucwtem m~P[oic: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
The crowd which gathered there / to comfort his sister / heard the Lord / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: Orang berkumpul, hendak hiburkan saudarinya, mendengar Tuhan berkata, "Lazarus keluarlah!“

text.language: الجموع الذين اجتمعوا هناك ليعزوا اخته سمعوا الرب قائلاً: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Peje Marya m~Pen[oic I/couc: a~nak,/ m~paima: narepacon mou an: alla ]nae~mi: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Martha said to our Lord Jesus / “Had You been here my brother would have not died / but I know [you will call]” / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: Kata Martha ke Tuhan kita Yesus, "Jika Kau di sini, saudaraku tak kan mati, tapi kutahu [Kau akan panggil], berkata, "Lazarus keluarlah!"

text.language: فقالت مرثا لربنا يسوع لو كنت هنا لم يمت أخي بل اني أعلم أنك تدعوه: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Pejaf nac n~je Pen[oic: je a~resan nah] n~q/t: ie h/ppe ]namou] e~rof: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Our Lord said to her / “If you believe in Me / then behold I will call him,” / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: Tuhan kita berkata padanya, "Jika kau percaya-Ku, lihatlah Ku akan memanggilnya, berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!“

text.language: فقال لها ربنا إن آمنت بي ها هوذا أدعوه: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Einah] je n~yok pe Ps/ri m~Vnou]: v/e~teouon s~jom m~mok: eyrekmou] e~rof qen tekjom: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
I believe that You are the Son of God / who is able to call him out / by Your might / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: "Aku percaya Kaulah Anak Allah, yang sanggup memanggil dia, berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!"

text.language: آمنت أنك أنت هو ابن الله تستطيع أن تدعوه بقوتك: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Nai e~tafjotou affai n~nefbal: e~p~swi ha pefiwt n~a~gayoc: efws e~bolqen ounis] n~c~m/: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Saying this He lifted His eyes / to His good Father / crying out with a great voice / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: Sambil berkata Dia menengadah pada Bapa-Nya yang baik, berseru dengan keras, berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!

text.language: لما قال هذا رفع عينيه الي فوق نحو أبيه الصالح صارخا بصوت عظيم: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Nilegeon etauconh m~mof: qen oumetbwk m~pii~tartaroc: pejwou je nim pe vai eyna je pai caji: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
The evil legions who bound him / in servitude in the depth of depths / said, “who is this who spoke / saying, ‘Lazarus come forth?’”

language.div: "Setan legion yang mengikatnya dan memperbudak di tempat yang dalam, berucap "Siapakah ini, yang berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!"

text.language: جنود الشر الذين أوثقوه في عبودية أسفل السافلين قائلين من هو هذا المتكلم: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Je nim pe vai etatef c~m/: afkws n~hanped/c n~nirefcwnh: je afjoc naf qen oumetatho]: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Who is this whose voice / broke the shackles of the bound / and told him without fear / saying, “Lazarus come forth?”

language.div: Siapakah ini, yang suara-Nya hancurkan belenggu, tanpa takut berkata padanya, "Lazarus keluarlah!“

text.language: من هو الذي صوته كسر قيود المربوطين وقال له بغير خوف: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Twounou ,af m~mof ouoh envwt: vai pe v/ettanqo n~nirefmwout: a~f] n~tefc~m/ ouoh afhonhen m~mof: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Rise, leave Him and flee. / This is the Life-Giver to the dead; / He revealed His voice and ordered him / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: Bangkit tinggalkan dan larilah kepadaNya, inilah Pemberi Hidup pada kematian, Dia menyatakan suara-Nya, memerintahkan dan berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!"

text.language: قوموا لنتركه ونهرب لأن هذا هو محيي الأموات أعلن صوته وأمره: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Catotf Lazaroc afi~ e~bol: efm/r n~oucodarion: qen p~jin y~re P[oic mou] e~rof: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Immediately, Lazarus came out / bound in linen / when the Lord called him / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: Segera Lazarus keluar, terikat linen waktu Tuhan memanggilnya, berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!“

text.language: فخرج لعازر لوقته مربوطاً بعمامة عندما دعاه الرب قائلاً: لعازر هلم خارجاً
N/e~taui~ ha Maria: aunah] eybe n/etauaitou: nem eybe ] c~m/ etaucoymec: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Those who came to Mary / believed because of what He had done / and because of the voice they heard / saying, “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: Mereka yang datang ke Maria, percaya karna perbuatan-Nya dan karna dengar suara-Nya yang berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!"

text.language: فأولئك الذين أتوا الي مريم آمنوا من أجل ما صنع ومن أجل الصوت الذي سمعوه: لعازر هلم خارجاً
Marenywou] ouoh n~tenhwc: m~Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: tenws e~bol m~v/etafjoc: je Lazaroc a~mou e~bol
Let us gather and praise / our Lord Jesus Christ; / we cry out to Him who said / “Lazarus come forth.”

language.div: Marilah berkumpul dan memuji, Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus, dan berseru pada-Nya yang berkata "Lazarus keluarlah!“

text.language: فلنجتمع ونسبح ربنا يسوع المسيح ونصرخ لمن قال: لعازر هلم خارجاً
<w nan e~bol n~nena~nomia~: ouoh moi nan n~oucwt/ria: hiten nentwbh nen nenp~recbia: n~te ten[oic n~n/b ]a~gia Maria.
Forgive us our sins / and grant us salvation / through the prayers and intercessions / of our Lady Saint Mary.

language.div: Ampunilah kesalahan kami, berikanlah kami keselamatan, dengan doa dan syafaat dari Bunda kita Santa Maria."Lazarus keluarlah."

text.language: اغفر لنا آثامنا واعطنا خلاصاً بطلبات وشفاعات سيدتنا الملكة القديسة مريم.
